thread.title: Newswire: Eva Green might star in Tim Burton’s Dumbo
thread.title_full: Newswire: Eva Green might star in Tim Burton’s Dumbo

author: William Hughes
title: Newswire: Eva Green might star in Tim Burton’s Dumbo
text:
Miss Peregrine's Home For Peculiar Children (Photo: Disney) Miss Peregrine's Home For Peculiar Children (Photo: Disney) Share Tweet 
Eva Green might be teaming back up with her old pal Tim Burton, with Deadline reporting that the Dark Shadows and Miss Peregrine’s Home For Peculiar Children star is in talks to appear in Burton’s live-action Dumbo movie. Burton’s film—the latest in a long line of Disney’s flesh and blood remakes, including the soon-to-be-released Beauty And The Beast — is apparently close to moving into production. If she takes the part, Green would play one of three main adult roles in the film, Burton’s riff on the 1941 tale of an elephant who teaches himself to fly. Burton’s live-action Dumbo was announced back in 2015 , with news coming earlier this year that Will Smith was also in talks for a starring role. 
Submit your Newswire tips here .
